SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_register_team (competition_id, team_name, team_leader_name, team_leader_phone, team_leader_student_id, team_leader_wechat, team_leader_college, team_user_list, delete_status, register_time) values (#{competitionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{teamName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teamLeaderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teamLeaderPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teamLeaderStudentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teamLeaderWechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teamLeaderCollege,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teamUserList,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleteStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{registerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update t_register_team set competition_id = #{competitionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, team_name = #{teamName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, team_leader_name = #{teamLeaderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, team_leader_phone = #{teamLeaderPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, team_leader_student_id = #{teamLeaderStudentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, team_leader_wechat = #{teamLeaderWechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, team_leader_college = #{teamLeaderCollege,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, team_user_list = #{teamUserList,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delete_status = #{deleteStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, register_time = #{registerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where register_id = #{registerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select register_id, competition_id, team_name, team_leader_name, team_leader_phone, team_leader_student_id, team_leader_wechat, team_leader_college, team_user_list, delete_status, register_time from t_register_team where register_id = #{registerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select register_id, competition_id, team_name, team_leader_name, team_leader_phone, team_leader_student_id, team_leader_wechat, team_leader_college, team_user_list, delete_status, register_time from t_register_team
